com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.cache

Class CacheManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.cache.CacheManager

  • public final class CacheManager
extends Object
    Grants bulk processing for all (statically) registered caches.

        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Invalidates all caches of the given user.
        Parameters:
        tenantId - The Id of the tenant for which all user caches should be invalidated.

        Returns:
        The number of invalidated cache entries.
